question: Which bank may invest $300 mn in dog-sitting app Wag?
explanation: Japanese conglomerate SoftBank is in talks to invest $300 million in the US-based dog-sitting app Wag, according to reports. This comes months after the startup was slammed for allegedly losing customers pets under its care. Founded in 2014, Wag gives on-demand access to dog handlers, who can be hired by the users for dog walking and dog sitting.
